testcase.classname: Tests de syntaxes pour l'objet PET du swagger
testcase.name: GET pet
testcase.system-out: Given user naviagte to the "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/2" api end point.passed And user verifies header in response body...................................passed And user verifies status code is 200........................................passed Then user verifies contet type is "application/json".......................passed

testcase.classname: Tests de syntaxes pour l'objet PET du swagger
testcase.name: POST pet
testcase.system-out: When user naviagte to the "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet" api end point..passed And user sets the request body..............................................passed And user verifies name is created in response body..........................passed

testcase.classname: Tests de syntaxes pour l'objet PET du swagger
testcase.name: DELETE pet
testcase.system-out: When user naviagte to the delete "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/9" api end point...passed And user verifies response message..........................................passed

testcase.name: Create one e2e test for petStore
testcase.failure:
Given user send the request body "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order" end point.passed When user sends pet ID in string format to request body....................passed Then user validates response code is 200....................................passed Then user verifies with order ID created stock is available.................passed Then user verifies that response contains pet ID and Status.................passed Then user delete created petStore...........................................passed And user verifies status code of deleted petStore...........................passed Then user verifies with GET request if petStore is deleted..................failed
